Reviews.Title: Great Ultrabook.
Reviews.Author: Bassetwrangler
Reviews.Content: I was thinking about waiting for the availability of the Surface Pro 3 but am really glad I did not. Build quality of the Yoga 2 Pro is exceptional, the high resolution display is sharp and bright, touchscreen sensitive and accurate and the slightly larger screen size makes the Yoga 2 Pro easier to use for document and content creation. It's my first Windows 8.1 machine but I was quickly able to configure away the very minor amount of installed crapware and install my application software from an external USB-interfaced DVD reader. I don't miss the lack (or weight) of a build in optical drive.I don't mean to sound like shill, but when a Windows computer with powerful i7 processor boots up in less than fifteen seconds I'm in love. I hope we have a long and happy relationship.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: David L Quinn
Reviews.Content: Meet all my requirements, love it.  It is fast and flexible and easy to use.  I would recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: JUST THE BATTERY
Reviews.Author: CARLOS LOMELI
Reviews.Content: AWESOME, EVERYTHING IS GREAT.. IT IS JUST THAT IT IS NOT THE BEST BATTERY PERFORMANCE.THE AMAZON SERVICE WAS AWESOME

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: LVJIANHONG
Reviews.Content: Something very good performance, and as I expected, I liked,I would recommend to friends around.Features a very powerful.Express is very fast.

Reviews.Title: Great computer and super light weight
Reviews.Author: OCarroll
Reviews.Content: Wonderful little computer. Very light weight and excellent quality.  Not using the touch screen much but nice that it is there.

Reviews.Title: the notebook did not work
Reviews.Author: alejandro
Reviews.Content: aparently there is a problem in the hard drive. the notebook did not work.i sent to tech service in my country but they dont have this model, so they did not accept it.i am very dissapinted and upset.i think it was not new!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!regrdas
